subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Martin Truex Jr., Dale Earnhardt Jr.’s teammate for now, has had the best run of his budding career, surging to 10th place in the driver standings.
snippet: Martin Truex Jr., Dale Earnhardt Jr.’s teammate for now, has had the best run of his budding career, surging to 10th place in the driver standings.
